p: For this purpose, the main objectives of the present investigation were to assess for the first time the phytochemical profile of T. polium methanolic extract from the Hail region (Saudi Arabia) using HR-LCMS. The antimicrobial activities of germander extract against a wide range and types of clinical bacterial and fungal isolates were also tested. The antiviral activity was tested for the first time against CVB3 and HSV-2. Inhibition of the production of some virulence factors in C. violaceum and P. aeruginosa PAO1 reporter strains were also investigated for the first time in the present work.
